attributes.action: Make Online Auctions more accountable for the Counterfeit, Stolen and Illegal items on sale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation to protect citizens and businesses from the amount of Counterfeit and Stolen Goods sold at Online Auctions.

At the moment Ebay claims to be "Just a Venue" this statement absolves theem (Ebay) from any responsibility.

Legislation is needed to force Online Auctions to be more accountable for the goods sold on their websites.

For example, Ebay has so many frauds that is would be impossible to list them in 1,000 words.
There are Illegal Firearms, Stolen Property, Counterfeit DVD's, Video's and computer software on sale any day of the week.

Ebays answer is; "we are just a venue".

I believe that Online Auctions should be held accountable for the items advertised and sold on its website.

Untill that happens, these items will  continue to be sold, by anonymous sellers that hide behind their Seller names, as happens on Ebay. 

If buyers were to stop and ask themselves; Would I really pay good money to someone that I have never met?

Yet that is exactly what is happening every minute of every day on Ebay.
